#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long res(long long a,long long b,long long n)
{
    long long arr[51];
    long long i;
    arr[1]=a,arr[2]=b;
    for(i=3;i<=n;i++)
    {
        arr[i]=arr[i-1]+arr[i-2];
    }
    return(arr[n]);
}
int main()
{
    long long a,b,n,t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&n);
        printf("%lld\n",res(a,b,n));
    }
    return 0;
}
